    • Uses of Order in storageLayer

      Methods in storageLayer that return Order 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Order OrderMapper.addOrder(Order order)
      This method adds a Order object to the database and returns the object with the auto-generated id key and status.
      static Order OrderMapper.getOrder(int id)
      This method fetch a Order object from the database with a specific order_id.
      static Order OrderMapper.updateOrder(Order order)
      This Method updates one or more details for an Order object.
      static Order OrderMapper.updateStatus(Order order)
      This method updates an orders status.
      Methods in storageLayer that return types with arguments of type Order 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<Order> OrderMapper.getAllOrders()
      This method fetch an ArrayList containing all placed Orders.
      static List<Order> OrderMapper.getOrders(String email)
      This method fetch an ArrayList containing all the Orders a specific email has placed.
